## UseToggleResult interface

An either-or value, and functions to update it.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface UseToggleResult<L, R> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [set](./hooks.usetoggleresult.set.md) |  | (value: L \| R) =&gt; void | Set it to left or right. |
|  [setLeft](./hooks.usetoggleresult.setleft.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Set the value to left. |
|  [setRight](./hooks.usetoggleresult.setright.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Set the value to right. |
|  [toggle](./hooks.usetoggleresult.toggle.md) |  | () =&gt; void | Toggle the value. |
|  [value](./hooks.usetoggleresult.value.md) |  | L \| R | Current value. |
